a.n: Pomrad: Live at Jazz en Baie Festival

p.k: Pomrad, alias Adriaan van de Velde, an electronic producer from Antwerp, creates harmonious and colourful music blended with by '80s funk, '90s rap, and elements of jazz, house, dub, and trap.
p.d: Pomrad, alias Adriaan van de Velde, an electronic producer from Antwerp, creates harmonious and colourful music blended with by '80s funk, '90s rap, and elements of jazz, house, dub, and trap. His productions are often compared to Hudson Mohawke and Daft Punk. Since 2014, Pomrad has been offering his audience a funky and highly visual show which has been successful at West European festivals. Following his first EP, Pomrad performs at Jazz en Baie with music of his album This Day.
